类 org.apache.hadoop.examples.pi.SummationWritable
的使用

  • 使用SummationWritable的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.examples.pi
    This package consists of a map/reduce application, distbbp, which computes exact binary digits of the mathematical constant π.

    • org.apache.hadoop.examples.pi中SummationWritable的使用
